titles.title: I Will Sing Unto You With Joy, O Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will sing unto You with joy, O Lord,
For You're the Rock of my salvation;
Come before You with thanksgiving,
And extol You with a song:
For You're the greatest King, above all else,
You hold the depths of the earth in Your hand,
And I will sing unto You with joy, O Lord,
For You're the Rock of my salvation.
